Yichen Wang is a senior student majoring in Applied Mathematics and Statistics at UCLA. He is also one of the founders of the Cicadas Chinese Calligraphy Club at UCLA. Being a data science enthusiast, he has worked on various machine learning projects and has a strong interest in financial engineering. 

## Education
- **University of California, Los Angeles**
  - Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics and Statistics & Data Science
  - September 2021 - June 2025
